name: Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine
description: '''Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine''' (or simply '''Richard Cheese''') is a [[cover band]] and [[comedy music|comedy act]], performing popular songs in a [[lounge music|lounge]]/swing style.
